name: unacceptable
content:

B2 too bad to be accepted, approved of, or allowed to continue: The teachers' union has described the latest pay offer as unacceptable. The taking of hostages, said the president, was totally unacceptable under any circumstances. The report found what it described as "unacceptable levels of air pollution" in several major cities.
